name: Powered By Cores
description:
Move with WASD or the arrow keys.

Kill the squares and move through the dungeon.

Shoot with the left button.

Dash with Space.

Collect a core (displayed as a hexagon) by pressing 'E'  near it (it only works if you don't have a core selected) Your character will change color to the core you collected.

Press 'Q' to drop your current core.

If you don't have any cores, you'll be shooting using the default core.

The game fits the theme cause your player gets joined together with a core. Different cores has different weapons.

When all squares are dead in a room, the doors (the colored rectangles) will change color and unlock the path forward.

Everything in the game is made in the 48 hour period. I worked alone on this.

There are 24 different cores in the game.

:D
